data.title: Bateman-Allen Funeral Home
data.text:
William F. Knight, 80, passed away March 12, 2017 at Belvedere Nursing Home, Chester, Pa. Born in Upland, PA, he has been a lifelong resident of Upland and Chester, Pa. He was a graduate of Chester High School, class of 1955. William retired from the Air Force after 20 years of service and went on to have a 24 year career as a Police Officer with the Chester Police Department. He was in the Police bowling league and also enjoyed fishing. He is predeceased by his first wife Jeanne Marie Knight and his parents Irene and Willliam F., Sr.

He is survived by his wife of 10 years Bruta Knight; children William F. Knight, III (Deborah), Christopher L. Knight, Marie Hanson (Steve), Trudy Choosakul (Steve), and Stephanie Knight (Robin); his siblings Stephen Knight (Mary) and Jacqueline Nagy (late Kenneth); 16 grandchildren; many great grandchildren.

Funeral service Saturday 11am at the Bateman-Allen Funeral Home, 4220 Edgmont Ave., Brookhaven, Pa, 19015. Visitation Saturday 10-11am at the funeral home. Interment Lawn Croft Cemetery, Linwood, Pa. Online condolences can be sent via www.batemanallenfuneralhome.com
